name: perl-exiftool
description: A distribution of exiftool in perl and exe form

scripts.download_exe: curl -L http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/exiftool/exiftool-10.25.zip -o exiftool-10.25.zip; unzip exiftool-10.25.zip -d vendor; rm exiftool-10.25.zip

author: Anton <anton@sobesednik.media>
